SALESFORCE HELP

SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Prepare Net Zero Cloud for Your Data

To handle diverse data requirements and to promote better decision-making and overall operational effectiveness, Salesforce provides multiple features to prepare your data. Organize information to tailor your data to specific requirements that align with your business objectives.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Configure Custom Values for Net Zero Cloud
Net Zero Cloud provides fuel type values and units of measure that you can use for emissions calculations. You can also create custom values for stationary or vehicle assets to meet your business needs.
Map Record Types for Net Zero Cloud
Perform carbon accounting from different environmental and emissions sources by setting up record types. After you create record types, map them to the picklist values on the corresponding configuration object.
Track Field History in Net Zero Cloud
For auditing purposes, track value changes for key Net Zero Cloud fields in carbon footprints, energy use records, and annual emissions inventory. These fields are used in carbon calculations and lookups. Track the value changes by setting up field history tracking.
